title: India vs Bharat Debate: Everything You Need To Know | TimelineDaily
selftext:
This article throws some insights to what went through in a constitution drafting meeting on the name Bharat and India. 

What caught my interest is how the meeting was conducted, registering differing views, and finally going for a naming strategy that fits so well to the state of our country back then and to my knowledge and conviction, to this day and the future as well. We, as citizens has always used these two words interchangeably without feeling any conflict at all. This should have been a non-issue.

I think the ruling party has opened a Pandoras box by allowing this "rumor" to take up media space. In my opinion, it was politically detrimental to the ruling party. Fact that the PM, who keeps shut on other burning issues, came out to kill the rumor, clearly shows it.
